build_web_ui.label: Build Web-UI
build_web_ui.command: docker exec lkms201-web-ui npx nx run web-ui:build

build_all.command: docker exec lkms201-web-ui npx nx run-many -t build

lint_all.label: Lint All

lint_all_no_cache.label: Lint (No Cache)
